description.fr: Lorsque votre héros traverse l’un de vos compagnons en étant {PropertyEffect:18[DÉPHASÉ]}\_: Lui confère {PropertyEffect:18} pour le tour sans réduire son {%AT}.
description.en: When your hero goes through one of your companions while {PropertyEffect:18[DEPHASED]}: Confers {PropertyEffect:18} on them for the turn without reducing their {%AT}.
description.es: Cuando tu héroe atraviesa a uno de tus compañeros estando {PropertyEffect:18[DESFASADO]}: Le confiere {PropertyEffect:18} durante el turno sin reducir su {%AT}.
description.de: Wenn dein Held einen deiner Begleiter im Zustand {PropertyEffect:18[PHASENVERSCHOBEN]} überquert: Verleiht ihm {PropertyEffect:18} für die Runde, ohne seinen {%AT} zu verringern.
description.pt: Quando seu herói atravessa um dos seus companheiros estando {PropertyEffect:18[DEFASADO]}: Concede {PropertyEffect:18} e ele durante o turno sem diminuir seu {%AT}.
